data.text: Fatal accident on Enugu–Onitsha expressway near Ugwuoba. Three vehicles involved, multiple casualties reported.
Flooding along Aba–Owerri road leaves commuters stranded for hours. Vehicles seen stuck in rising water.
Protest erupts in Abakaliki as traders block major junction over multiple taxation.
Gunmen attack bus along Onitsha–Owerri road, passengers robbed of belongings.
Petrol tanker falls at Ninth Mile, Enugu. Residents warned to avoid the area due to spillage.
Traffic gridlock in Aba as a trailer overturned near Osisioma flyover.
Heavy police checkpoint causes long delays on Owerri–Onitsha expressway.
Multiple accidents reported on Enugu–Port Harcourt road due to ongoing construction.
Abia state transport union strike leaves commuters stranded in Umuahia.
Truck carrying goods loses control and crashes near Ekwulobia, Anambra State.
Power outage sparks protests in Nsukka, roads blocked by angry youths.
Rainstorm damages buildings and uproots trees in Owerri, several roads blocked.
Motorists lament extortion by touts along Abakaliki–Onueke highway.
Collapsed bridge cuts off communities in Ihiala, Anambra.
Armed robbery reported near Aba–Ikot Ekpene road junction.
Umuahia–Owerri road partially blocked as farmers protest over land dispute.
Long queues at Enugu fuel stations as scarcity worsens.
Fire outbreak in Ariaria Market, Aba. Several shops gutted.
Heavy traffic reported at Upper Iweka, Onitsha following minor collision.
Residents of Abakaliki protest bad roads, block government house entrance.
Tanker fire narrowly averted in Nnewi after vehicle skidded off the road.
Hoodlums vandalize buses at Owerri motor park, passengers flee.
Collapsed drainage causes flooding at New Market Road, Enugu.
Accident involving a tricycle and bus leaves two injured in Umuahia.
Erosion sweeps away part of road at Orlu–Mbano axis.
Police foil attempted kidnapping near Okigwe, Imo State.
Collapsed electric pole blocks road at Achara Layout, Enugu.
Market fire prevented in Onitsha after quick response from fire service.
Flooding reported again at Aba–Owerri road as rains continue.
Enugu–Onitsha expressway partially reopened after morning accident cleanup.
